Nor is it possible to say that the 20 points convert race into a decisive
factor comparable to reserving minority places as in Bakke.Of course we
can conceive of a point system in which the “plus” factor given to minor-
ity applicants would be so extreme as to guarantee every minority appli-
cant a higher rank than every nonminority applicant in the uni
